title: r/Askreddit What's the WORST Customer You've Ever Had?
description: r/Askreddit You think you've seen some bad customers at work? Well, get ready to call your manager's manager, because the Karens, idiots, and douche bags in today's Askreddit stories showcase the absolute worst that mankind has to offer. If you like this video, let me know by hitting the like button and be sure to subscribe for daily Reddit videos!
